title: Samsung brings four years of Android updates to Galaxy S22, S21, Flip 3, and Fold 3; beats Pixel 6
content:
Samsung has been getting better and better when it comes to Android update support, often beating Google’s own Pixel phones on speed and longevity. Now, Samsung has announced that it will offer four years of major Android updates on the Galaxy S22 and some other recent releases.

more…

The post Samsung brings four years of Android updates to Galaxy S22, S21, Flip 3, and Fold 3; beats Pixel 6 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Starting with the Galaxy S22 and nearly a dozen other devices, Samsung is officially offering up to four major Android updates to buyers.
